introduction: You have been under stress recently and your doctor told you your cortisol levels are high. You are looking for ways to lower your cortisol levels.
question: How can I lower my cortisol level?

answers.text: Stress management, such as mindfulness, meditation and relaxation  or interacting with dogs for an hour can lower cortisol levels.

ref.title: Tips to Reduce Cortisol Levels and Dial Down Stress
The Friend Who Keeps You Young

answers.text: Balneotherapy (using water or bathing as treatment) or spa treatments may also help.

ref.title: Effects of balneotherapy and spa therapy on levels of cortisol as a stress biomarker
ref.text: Review Int J Biometeorol. 2018 Jun; Laboratorio di Statistica Medica ed Epidemiologia Clinica, Department of Medicine and Surgery, University of Parma, Via Gramsci, 14, 43126, Parma, Italy. michele.1989@hotmail.it.

answers.text: Electrical stimulation and acupuncture may have some effect too.

ref.title: Inhibitory effects of biofeedback electrostimulation therapy on pain and cortisol levels in chronic neuropathic pain
ref.text: Turk J Phys Med Rehabil. 2021 Mar 4; Department of Anesthesiology, Faculty of Medicine, University of Malaya, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

answers.text: Supplements, and hormones melatonin and dehydroepiandrosterone (DHEA) might help as well.

ref.title: How to Lower Cortisol Levels and Feel Great While Doing It
Effects of Withania somnifera on Cortisol Levels in Stressed Human Subjects
ref.text: Review in Nutrients. 2023 Dec 5; Department of Biomedical and Clinical Sciences, University of Milano, 20157 Milan, Italy.

options: Look for alternative medical treatments, such as acupuncture
Start taking the recommended over-the-counter supplements
Ask your doctor if you need more tests to rule out other causes of high cortisol levels
